text: Fredrik Thordendal (born 11 February 1970) is a Swedish guitarist. He is best known for being the guitarist for extreme metal band Meshuggah. Along with other Meshuggah guitarist Mårten Hagström, Thordendal was called one of the 100 best guitarists of all time by Guitar World. He was one of the people who made Meshuggah. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish guitarists Category:Meshuggah Category:People from Umeå
title: Fredrik Thordendal
